add contact: Add a contact to your contacts. Ex: Create contact
amazon: shop for products on Amazon. Ex: search for cat food on amazon
check contact: Check contact info. Ex: What's my name
change contact: Chance contact info. Ex: Call me Milfred
display contacts: Lists all your contacts. Ex: list contacts
email: Check or send email. Ex: email example@example.com
general term lookup: Lookup terms or people. Ex: What is a cat, Who is Linus Torvalds
location: Get your current location. Ex: where am i? what country am i in
music control: Control the music. Ex: play, pause, next, previous
movies: Check local movies. Ex: movies near me, showtimes for Justice League
news: Opens news on Google News. Ex: News, news about cats
open: Opens a website, file, or application. Ex: go to google.com, open Steam
palindrome: Checks if word is palindrome. Ex: Is racecar a palindrome
random decisions: Makes random decisions. Ex: flip a coin
reddit: Searchs reddit for content. Ex: Find cats on reddit
remove contact: Removes a contact. Ex: Remove contact Timmy Timnson
sing: Plays a nice song. Windows Only Ex: sing
terminal: Run a command in Terminal. Ex: run ls
terminal mode: Open a terminal session. Ex: terminal mode
thesaurus: Finds synonyms of a word. Ex: Synonyms for silly
time: Gets the time or date. Ex: What time is it?, What's the date
timer: Counts down down from a number. Ex: Count down from 10
translation: Translate phrases. Translate hombre malo to English
volume: Sets volume to a number between 0 and 100. Ex: set volume to 6, volume 4
wikipedia: Search wikipedia for topics. Ex: wikipedia history of cheese graters.
weather: Checks the local weather. Ex: What's the weather like
xkcd: Opens an xkcd comic. Ex: xkcd 127, xkcd
